TEXT.S:
Andrej Kiska
u siwkay niza 2 bulad 2 demiad, Andrej Kiska, u misingkiway. 1963 a mihca nalecuhan) u tabakiay a tapang nu kanatal (congtung) nu Slovakiaayza sa ci Andrej Kiska, micakat a demiad sa i 2014 a mihca 6 bulad 15 demiad. ciniza sa ku pacakayay, mikuwanay.
u ngangan niza u ngangan nu Hulam: 路 u ngangan nu Lipun: u ngangan nu Amilika: Andrej Kiska
kakuniza sasulitan nu Hulam atu Amilika 路2014路路 Andrej Kiska is a Slovak entrepreneur, writer and philanthropist who has been President of Slovakia since 2014. He ran as an independent candidate in the 2014 presidential election and was elected as President in the second round of voting. He has written two books about happiness, success and his life.
